overview: We learn the 1500-year-old secrets and constructions of Hagia Sophia. Dr. “Mysterious History: Hagia Sophia”, which was screened about the education of Hikmet Kırık, opens the veil of secrecy of the living temple. With the touch of Mimar Sinan, we explore the unknowns of a mysterious temple.
title: Gizemli Tarih: Ayasofya
